word:
MR No. 1428 - Early Days at the Sydney Hospital; Cautions on Drug Medication

     (Written to "Dear Son Willie," August 5, 1897, from Summer Hill Health Home, [KNOWN TODAY AS THE SYDNEY ADVENTIST HOSPITAL.] Sydney, N.S.W.) 


     I left my fountain pen at home and it is a sad mistake for me. But then I have been overtaxed with writing and my head refuses to work, so it is not much writing I can do. All day yesterday was spent in Sydney and we were very tired when we returned home.
